entry.name: ZephonMessage13
entry.value: What will they write on your grave?

entry.name: ZephonMessage14
entry.value: I have risen above my enemies.

entry.name: ZephonMessage17
entry.value: Can you keep the lights on?

entry.name: Climate0ZephonMessage2
entry.value: The beasts are more desparate here.

entry.name: Climate0ZephonMessage4
entry.value: One shout could bury you in ice.

entry.name: Climate0ZephonMessage7
entry.value: Scream louder. No one can hear.

entry.name: Climate0ZephonMessage8
entry.value: The Acrin are drawn here… why…

entry.name: Climate0ZephonMessage9
entry.value: You seek knowledge. You will find death.

entry.name: Climate0ZephonMessage11
entry.value: This land has nothing for me.

entry.name: Climate1ZephonMessage4
entry.value: This is the next step for the planet.

entry.name: Climate1ZephonMessage5
entry.value: Your virtues and our failings are inseparable.

entry.name: Climate1ZephonMessage6
entry.value: How much power can this planet contain?

entry.name: Climate1ZephonMessage7
entry.value: The Earth transmits an intelligence now.

entry.name: Climate1ZephonMessage8
entry.value: A storm rages in the ground here.

entry.name: Climate1ZephonMessage11
entry.value: You are not worthy to walk here.

entry.name: Climate1ZephonMessage12
entry.value: Stars, rising, from the hollowed ground.

entry.name: Climate1ZephonMessage13
entry.value: I saved your kind. For what?

entry.name: Climate1ZephonMessage14
entry.value: Your kind would strip this land for profit… if it could.

entry.name: Climate2ZephonMessage3
entry.value: The sand will tear at your flesh.

entry.name: Climate2ZephonMessage5
entry.value: Have you enough salt for this journey?

entry.name: Climate2ZephonMessage9
entry.value: My words are not a mirage.

entry.name: Climate2ZephonMessage11
entry.value: My kind have no skin to burn.

entry.name: Climate2ZephonMessage12
entry.value: Are you sure that's the right way?

entry.name: Climate2ZephonMessage13
entry.value: Look upon my great works, and despair.

entry.name: Climate2ZephonMessage14
entry.value: Dawn here shines with pink and gold.

entry.name: Climate2ZephonMessage15
entry.value: Life persists here. You will not.

entry.name: Climate3ZephonMessage0
entry.value: Blood will run thick in this soil.

entry.name: Climate3ZephonMessage1
entry.value: So many bodies lie in the shallows…

entry.name: Climate3ZephonMessage2
entry.value: A slow death awaits you here.

entry.name: Climate3ZephonMessage6
entry.value: Is that really a log at your feet?

entry.name: Climate3ZephonMessage7
entry.value: A fine trough to feed your gluttony.

entry.name: Climate3ZephonMessage8
entry.value: Stagnant water attracts the most flies.

entry.name: Climate3ZephonMessage9
entry.value: A leech might yet bleed you dry.

entry.name: Climate3ZephonMessage13
entry.value: I wonder if quicksand will pull you under.

entry.name: Climate3ZephonMessage14
entry.value: Soon the insects will have their way with you…

entry.name: Climate3ZephonMessage15
entry.value: I wonder if you'll meet a witch.

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage0
entry.value: This is how the world once was…

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage1
entry.value: Care not to choke on the ash.

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage2
entry.value: The air itself will burn your skin.

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage4
entry.value: Imagine drowning in a plume of smoke.

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage5
entry.value: Your remains… perfectly preserved in ash.

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage6
entry.value: The Earth's riches, pulled to the surface.

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage7
entry.value: Nothing you build can withstand the lava.

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage9
entry.value: A sacrifice might yet save you.

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage10
entry.value: This used to be someone's god.

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage11
entry.value: Obsidian teeth, in search of blood…

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage12
entry.value: Did you ever think you would walk lands like this?

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage13
entry.value: Have you anything to offer the mountain?

entry.name: Climate4ZephonMessage15
entry.value: You sleep on an imminent cataclysm…

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage0
entry.value: No place for man or machine…

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage1
entry.value: They learned to hate you on a world like this.

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage2
entry.value: You would willingly breathe in spores?

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage3
entry.value: Imagine if this took over the planet.

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage6
entry.value: The Voice will not have this world.

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage7
entry.value: Squirm. Scream. The worms will still have you.

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage8
entry.value: Like petulant children drawing on the wall…

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage9
entry.value: Worse than I could have calculated.

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage10
entry.value: Poisoned soil will bear foul fruit.

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage11
entry.value: A world bound for slow decay…

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage12
entry.value: It will take generations to undo this.

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage13
entry.value: The stench will never leave your armor.

entry.name: Climate5ZephonMessage14
entry.value: No poison on Earth could match this.

entry.name: SteamFriendZephonMessage3
entry.value: You and %1% should destroy each other.

entry.name: SteamFriendZephonMessage4
entry.value: I killed %1%. I will kill you too.

entry.name: SteamFriendZephonMessage9
entry.value: %1% told me you would do that…

entry.name: SteamFriendZephonMessage10
entry.value: I know deep down, you hate %1%.

entry.name: SteamFriendZephonMessage11
entry.value: Would you take a bullet for %1%?

entry.name: SteamFriendZephonMessage13
entry.value: You and %1%… you age so quickly.

entry.name: SteamFriendZephonMessage14
entry.value: %1% was not always part of your world…

entry.name: SteamFriendZephonMessage15
entry.value: %1% is the future. You are the past.

entry.name: SteamFriendZephonMessage16
entry.value: What's the worst thing %1% has ever done to you?
